content: I'm preparing my next conference. Next week I'll return to maths. Civilization is restored, look at that schedule: http://www.crm.umontreal.ca/2019/MinicoursGeometrie19/horaire_e.html (go down to Monday, June 10, this week was too packed with talks). Computer scientists need to learn this.

• 09:00 - 09:30 Coffee & Croissants
  • 09:30 - 11:00 talk
  • 11:00 - 15:30 Discussions and Lunch Break
  • 15:30 - 16:00 Coffee
  • 16:00 - 17:30 Talk

http://wwwf.imperial.ac.uk/~buzzard/LNTS/londonparis.html

I think it's a French thing Patrick.
